      • getFromCache

        @GET
 @Path(value="/getFromCache")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
com.att.scld.grm.v1.FindRunningServiceEndPointResponse getFromCache(@DefaultValue(value="*") @QueryParam(value="serviceName")

                                                                                                                                               @DefaultValue(value="*") @QueryParam(value="env")

        Parameters:
        serviceName, - leave blank for wildcard
        env, - leave blank for wildcard

        list of service endpoints in form of FindRunningServiceEndPointResponse

      • add

        @POST
 @Path(value="/add")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
String add(String requestBodyJSON)
        Deprecated. 
        Allows you to add Pods and services to the cache using POST. Currently only Pods has been implemented. Provide JSON in the body of your request. This method is not supported. Please do not use it. It is for testcases only
        Parameters:
        JSON - supplying attributes required for a pod or service
        Returns:
        Success or Fail

      • delete

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/delete")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
String delete(String requestBodyJSON)
        Deprecated. 
        Allows you delete pods and services from the cache. Currently only deleting pods will work. This method is not supported. Please do not use it. It is for testcases only
        Parameters:
        JSON - supplying attributes required for a pod or service
        Returns:
        Success or Fail
